main event: An unidentified flying object was sighted in the vicinity of Klamath Falls and Medford, Oregon on February 26, 1953.
interesting points: The object was round with a red glow,Estimates suggest the object was 30-40 feet in size,It maintained a stationary position at an estimated altitude of 10,000 feet,The sighting lasted for approximately 14 minutes and 55 seconds,Project Blue Book concluded the object was likely Venus.
witness description: Unidentified radio operators and observers from Klamath Falls and Medford, Oregon
